desc: The nrd from Germ Nerds. Better than clean key anti microbial protection for your hands better than a clean key. Allows you to touch and grab and pull any object without exposing your hands to dirty surfaces. Break the chain of contagion and keep your hands free of dirty germs and bacteria. Available in multiple colors

layout.text: Touch, tap, grip and grab any surface with the nrd.™ to keep yourself safe from germs.
